#Text=The Boston Celtics ( 11 - 8 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 7 - 13 ) 114 - 97 on Thursday in Mexico City .
#Text=Boston outscored Sacramento 32 - 17 in the first quarter and the game was never competitive after that .
#Text=The frustration clearly boiled over for this Kings team , as Rajon Rondo was ejected in the third quarter .
#Text=The Celtics came into this game as one of the best assisting teams in the NBA and that proved to be the difference , as they outassisted the Kings 34 - 21 .
#Text=Boston also shot 48 percent from the field , while Sacramento shot just 38 percent .
#Text=Boston came into this game as the more well - rounded team with less talent and the teamwork prevailed yet again .
#Text=While DeMarcus Cousins , Rajon Rondo and Rudy Gay were likely the three best players on the floor , the Celtics are simply a better team .
#Text=In fact , four players on the Celtics scored at least 20 points and this was an all - around great team effort .
#Text=It was a revenge game for Isaiah Thomas and he was fantastic , tallying 21 points , nine assists , six rebounds and four steals in the win .
#Text=Kelly Olynyk also had a nice game off the bench , as he collected 21 points , four rebounds and four assists in the victory .
#Text=Boston will have a great test in their next game when they take on the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday .
#Text=The Kings had a rough night in Mexico City and they 'll be happy to get out of there .
#Text=Rondo was ejected in the third quarter for two technical fouls and it was a bit of a surprise he was the only one with all the frustration the Kings showed .
#Text=DeMarcus Cousins had a lackluster game , as he tallied just 16 points , seven rebounds and four assists while battling foul trouble .
#Text=The best player for Sacramento on this night was Rudy Gay , who contributed 18 points and seven rebounds in the loss .
#Text=The Kings will look to bounce - back when they take on the Houston Rockets on Saturday in what should be a high - scoring bonanza .
